original_title: 葉蒨文完全是你演唱會2012
overview: Semi-retired Canto-pop diva Sally Yeh made her glorious comeback to the stage in September 2012 with her Sally Is Intimately Yours concerts. Held at the Hong Kong Coliseum, where she was a constant fixture in the 1990s and last played there seven years ago, the highly anticipated concerts brought back memories with a string of Sally's heartfelt love songs and groovy dance numbers.
title: Sally Is Intimately Yours Concert 2012
